meanings.definition: A railroad car designed for carrying freight or passengers.
meanings.sent1: The railcars were filled with goods for delivery.
meanings.sent2: The passengers boarded the railcars for their journey.
meanings.sent3: The railcars decided to have a race to see who could carry the most cargo!
meanings.sent4: The railcars lined up on the track like a row of obedient soldiers.
meanings.sent5: The shiny railcars rattled along the tracks, a colorful sight against the green landscape.

meanings.definition: A vehicle on rails used for transportation.
meanings.sent1: The railcars transported people to different cities.
meanings.sent2: The old railcars were still in use for moving goods.
meanings.sent3: The railcars threw a surprise party for the locomotive!
meanings.sent4: The railcars glided smoothly along the tracks, like graceful dancers.
meanings.sent5: The loud whistle announced the arrival of the railcars at the station.
